Mod.name: Wand Locator
Mod.description:
Simple GUI mod that finds the stats of wands around the world! 
Other Features: 
Offset X/Y Search Position in mod settings. 
Refresh Button clears the list, and restarts the sprial search. Best used with Offsets. 
Fast Search to skip clicking each Wand find. 
 
Bug Free, compatible with (most) mods. 
Enjoy!
